content:
That sounds like a great idea! The invitation design and wording you suggested are both beautiful and meaningful. I especially like the idea of incorporating a picture of Ava and a special message about her adoption journey. It will make the invitation even more personal and special.

I think I'll go with a traditional Chinese-inspired design, with a red and gold color scheme and Chinese characters. And I'll definitely include a picture of Ava, either a sonogram or a recent photo. For the wording, I'll use something like "Join us as we celebrate the arrival of Ava, our little bundle of joy from China!" and add a special message about her adoption journey.

Thanks for your help with the invitation ideas! Do you have any suggestions for games or activities that we can play during the baby shower?
